title: Since I'm no longer a mod, does that mean I get to shitpost again?
body:
Without being told where or how to do it by people who literally don't understand how the moderation system works?

Maybe now you guys will believe me when I shitpost and understand that it's not a mod bias.

---
Yes I know the boards hasn't updated its thing for like two hours but trust me. You can tell because at least the Specialist tag has updated.
